HomePage.title: Revolutionize Your Search Experience
HomePage.subTitle: Harness the power of AI to find exactly what you're looking for.
HomePage.benefitsDesc_1: AI-powered search engines deliver faster results, allowing you to find relevant information quickly and efficiently.
HomePage.benefitsDesc_2: AI algorithms provide higher accuracy in search results, ensuring that you receive accurate and up-to-date information.
HomePage.benefitsDesc_3: AI-powered search engines offer personalized insights, allowing you to receive tailored recommendations and suggestions based on your interests and preferences.

featureSection.title: Feature List
featureSection.featureDescriptions: Enhance your search experience with our cutting-edge features.
